revised_title: Obituary Notices of David Thomas Ansted and William Hallowes Miller
tldr: This article provides obituary notices for David Thomas Ansted and William Hallowes Miller, two notable figures in the field of geology and mineralogy. Ansted was a consulting geologist and mining engineer, while Miller was a prominent crystallographer and professor of mineralogy. Both individuals made significant contributions to their respective fields and left a lasting impact on the scientific community.
